pall.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if something palls, it becomes less interesting or enjoyable because you have experienced it before
pall.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Gradually, the novelty of city life began to pall.
pall.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a thick dark cloud of smoke, dust etc
pall.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: A pall of thick grey smoke hung over the buildings.
pall.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a cloth used to cover a coffin (=a box containing a dead body)
